articles.title: Southeast Asia needs $210 bln annual investment on renewables -IRENA - Reuters
articles.description: Southeast Asian nations need to more than double their annual investment on renewables to accelerate energy transition and to meet climate goals, a report released on Thursday by the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) showed.

articles.description: Fortunately, most of these cysts are harmless. But, there are a few things that you need to be aware of before removing ovarian cyst during pregnancy.
